GITHUB_TOKEN.description: Optional Key. Github personal token obtained from https://github.com/settings/tokens

TWITTER_CONSUMER_KEY.description: Twitter consumer key obtained from https://apps.twitter.com/

TWITTER_CONSUMER_SECRET.description: Twitter consumer key obtained from https://apps.twitter.com/

GIPHY_API_KEY.description: Below key is public key. Giphy personal API key can be obtained by submitting form in http://api.giphy.com/submit
